category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_file_module_separator
preference.preference_description:
Specifies which module separator to use for a specific International Material Data System (IMDS) file type. The values are used by the "imds_split_file" and "imds_download_process_files" utilities. If you do not provide a separator value for a file type, the file type is not split by the specified utilities. The format for specifying valid values for the preference is:
The IMDS file type Comma (,) The record identifier to be used as a separator Comma (,) The number of record identifiers that the split file must contain
For a list of valid file types and record identifiers, refer to the Help available on the IMDS portal. The default values are: "CMS,MC,1" "MPS,MC,1" "CC,CO,1000"
